title: Usholta Cave
about: The Usholta Cave is located in Racha, Oni Municipality, near the village of Usholta, on the Racha Ridge, at 1840 meters above sea level. In the cave, there are dripping formations. The halls "Tbilisi University", "Vakhushti" and others are especially beautiful. The total length of the Usholta Cave is 2150 meters. A stream flows out of the cave. Usholta Cave is one of the most impressive and interesting places for lovers of nature and the mystical beauty of karst caves.
